dcterms:creator: R. Lowe
Y. Wu
A. Tamar
J. Harb
O. Pieter Abbeel
I. Mordatch
dcterms:description: Multi-Agent Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient (MADDPG) is a reinforcement learning algorithm designed for mixed cooperative-competitive environments, utilizing a centralized training approach with decentralized execution.
dcterms:title: Multi-Agent Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient (MADDPG)

dcterms:creator: Y. Wang
F. Zhong
J. Xu
Y. Wang
dcterms:description: Target-oriented Multi-agent Communication and Cooperation (ToM2C) is a reinforcement learning framework that incorporates a theory of mind to enhance communication and cooperation among agents based on their mental states.
dcterms:title: Target-oriented Multi-agent Communication and Cooperation (ToM2C)

dcterms:creator: T. Chu
S. Chinchali
S. Katti
dcterms:description: Networked Multi-agent RL (NeurComm) is a framework for decentralized multi-agent reinforcement learning that focuses on networked systems, utilizing a differentiable neural communication protocol to optimize agent interactions.
dcterms:title: Networked Multi-agent RL (NeurComm)
